title: Sashameat, COVID Money, Karen The Opera, Lizzo Breakdown and more.
itunes:title: Sashameat, COVID Money, Karen The Opera, Lizzo Breakdown and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We rockin' today. Is it appropriate to shake the Sugar Honey Iced Tea out of a grown boy at Best Buy or nah? Dherbs is in the building for Wellness Wednesday. Negativity on social media has made Lizzo breakdown. Our resident poet hits us with another poetic masterpiece. Should there be legal ramifications or a physical beatdown for knowingly sending your kid to school with a positive COVID-19 test result? Bitterman re-writes Karen The Opera. Today the show wraps up with an old playa showing you how to get it done!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
